input.sentences: when i awoke on the morning i saw that there was snow and everything was frozen !
i was so excited because it had been a long time since i had seen snow . my street looked so cool covered in snow .
the tree next to my apartment looked really cool ( no pun intended ) too with the snow draped upon it .
i felt bad for some of the berries though because they would have to bloom during this period . sad .
i then remembered my bike was outside and i looked for it and found it . oops ! well | i guess i 'll just have to take a snow day ! ha !
output.sentences: The trees were frozen when I looked out the window this morning.
There were also several inches of snow covering the street.
A large storm must have passed through last night and buried the trees.
I hope the birds like frozen berries.
Suddenly, I remembered my bike was out there - oops!
